info.ephyra.questionanalysis
Class TermExtractor

java.lang.Object
  info.ephyra.questionanalysis.TermExtractor

public class TermExtractor
extends java.lang.Object

Extracts single- and multi-token terms from a sentence. Multi-token terms are named entities or compound terms found in dictionaries.

Version:
2007-05-28
Author:
Nico Schlaefer

          Maximum length of a term in tokens.

Checks if the given term is among the named entities and returns the types of the entities that match it.

Parameters:

nes - named entities
Returns:

getTerms

public static Term[] getTerms(java.lang.String sentence,
                              java.lang.String[][] nes,
                              Dictionary[] dicts)
Extracts terms from the given sentence, reusing named entities that have been extracted before.

Parameters:
sentence - sentence to analyze
nes - named entities in the sentence
dicts - dictionaries with compound terms
Returns:
terms in the sentence

                              Dictionary[] dicts)
Extracts terms from the given sentence and context string.

Parameters:
sentence - sentence to analyze
context - context string
nes - named entities in the sentence and context string
dicts - dictionaries with compound terms

terms in the sentence and context string
